title: [Western DragonSpine, Slope]
description: Mist clings to the grey rock face, the air calm and cool.  Patches of lichen and moss cover the rock, blending a darker grey into the rocky surroundings.  A narrow ledge leads to the southeast, while all other directions are blocked by the steep mountainside.  Below, the ground is barely visible through the mist.

Mist clings to the grey rock face, the air calm and cool.  Patches of lichen and moss cover the rock, adding some drab color to the otherwise grey surroundings.  A narrow ledge leads to the southeast, while all other directions are blocked by the steep mountainside.  Below, the ground is barely visible through the mist.
